A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I couldn't believe this. Such a let down. Left the theater completely disappointed. This is my least favorite movie in the entire saga.. It isnt well written\, and feels like a Marvel or Super hero movie. Definitely does not feel like the Star Wars (TFA at least felt like a star wars movie). If this is the direction they take the franchise it will no go the way that they think..

They traded in good story telling for cheap surprises that no one would expect

Why would Luke leave a map behind to find him\, only to say in this movie he never wants to be found? Just stupid.

They undid everything that happened in 4\,5\,6. Its all meaningless now we are starting over.

JJ gave Rian a blank slate\, an easy home run\, and he blew it. Good luck to JJ trying to fix this mess.  
 
Stop undoing what happened in the original trilogy\, the new cast is great and can coexist with the old leaving their legacy and accomplishments intact. 

Good luck JJ\, Rian gave you a tangled shit mess to unravel\, and a disappointed fanbase that didn't get anything they wanted out of this movie other than shitty surprises.
